name: [Solo Project] Tempus - Windows
description:
Tempus is a first-person game set within a one minute time loop experience. You, the player will need to resolve and repair technology from within it in order to escape the loop that Jordan, the main character has found themselves within. 

Built in Unity 2020.3.13f1, Tempus is still in development and is currently in Alpha testing for players interested in providing feedback and following the development journey of the game. Further updates will be coming this year.
